sources.title: Deluge 1933 Sidney Blackmer Colorized
sources.description: Gripping post-apocalyptic drama about a cataclysmic earthquake and flood that destroy the world, and how various survivors cope with their circumstances. Surprisingly well-done disaster special effects for a film of its time. Stars Sydney Blackmer, Peggy Shannon and Fred Kohler. IMDB page: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0023938 Colorization by EzzyFallsOut using DeOldify technology. (Note: Although this movie is public domain, the colorization is copyright by me. My colorized movies are freely uploaded for free personal use. Please don't put them on your own YouTube channel and monetize them. Thanks.)
